description: Students are assigned to a full-time internship in
schools under the guidance of a competent cooperating teacher and supervised by faculty
from both the content area department and the Education Department. Minimum of 6-12
full-time weeks teaching. Only student teachers may enroll: seniors or college graduates
seeking an additional license. Offered each semester and during January Term. Cannot be taken
concurrently with EDUC 389. Prerequisite: completion of EDUC 389
